thread.title: WATCH: There is a drone that looks like an origami crane
thread.title_full: WATCH: There is a drone that looks like an origami crane - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: WATCH: There is a drone that looks like an origami crane
text:
Nowadays drones come in all shapes and sizes, including origami form.
Japanese company LAPIS Semiconductor has created the Orizuru, a drone origami crane that only weights 1oz and can fly like a bird.
The Orizuru was design and built in three months and consists of a 3-D printed nylon skeleton and multiple layers of paper. The drone is also powered by LAPIS' microcomputer, which claims to be 90% more energy efficient than its competitors.
ROHMmedia1/via YouTube Japanese company LAPIS Semiconductor has created the Orizuru, a drone origami crane that can fly like a bird. ROHMmedia1/via YouTube The origami drone only weighs 1oz. Previous Next Enlarge LAPIS said the Orizuru was released to the public so origami fans could recreate it themselves.
